values.name: Very Low
values.description: The adversary has very limited resources, expertise, and opportunities to support a successful attack.

values.name: Low
values.description: The adversary has limited resources, expertise, and opportunities to support a successful attack.

values.name: Moderate
values.description: The adversary has moderate resources, expertise, and opportunities to support multiple successful attacks.

values.name: High
values.description: The adversary has a sophisticated level of expertise, with significant resources and opportunities to support multiple successful coordinated attacks.

values.name: Very High
values.description: The adversary has a very sophisticated level of expertise, is well-resourced, and can generate opportunities to support multiple successful, continuous, and coordinated attacks.
